mapper.select: select calendar_idx, member_idx, title, content, rdate, wdate from (select row_number() over(partition by substr(rdate, 1, 8) order by rdate asc) rn, calendar_idx, member_idx, title, content, rdate, wdate from calendar where member_idx=#{member_idx} and substr(rdate, 1, 6)= #{rdate}) where rn between 1 and 15 ORDER BY calendar_idx desc
mapper.insert: INSERT into calendar(calendar_idx, member_idx, title, content, rdate, wdate) VALUES (calendar_seq.nextval, #{member_idx}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rdate}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(member_idx) from calendar where member_idx = #{member_idx}
mapper.sql:
select rownum rnum, B.* from (
and title LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
order by calendar_idx desc )B order by rnum
